title: Fontographer Tech Info
content:
I noticed that with the announcement of FontLab's acquisiton of Fontographer, Macromedia's Fog Technical Support information pages were inaccessible. Does anyone know if these are being hosted somewhere? They don't seem to be at the FontLab site.

Gerald
author: bieler

comments.content:
They may be within the [Technotes PDF file](http://web.archive.org/web/20131107123103/http:/www.fontlab.com/Fontographer/Fontographer/Download-Fontographer/).

Thanks to Adam Twardoch, who just happens to be sitting to my right.

That's them. Thank you so much.

Gerald
